channel.title: Userdata on ScrapComputers
channel.description: Recent content in Userdata on ScrapComputers

item.title: BitStream
item.description: A Bitstream that is a stream of bits! (What did you expect!) Fields pos [ number ] The position in the string itself (Bit by Bit!

item.title: HologramObject
item.description: A HologramObject is an object from a hologram. AKA: An object that you’re rendering on the hologram. Functions getId HologramObject.getId() Gets the ID of the object

item.title: MD5Stream
item.description: This is an MD5 Stream, Allows you to add additional data. Fields a [ number ] Unknown. The default Value is 0x67452301 (Number form: 1732584193) b [ number ] Unknown.
